Reviews.Title: “Convenient, Clean, and Luxurious--a pleasant surprise!”

Reviews.Content: im wondering stayed rest reviewers experience hotel absolutely perfect reading reviews travelling couple weeks staying hostels werent expecting warming idea shower read reviews train termini station wrh suites conveniently located 5 minutes walk checking tricky believe 5th floor check actually 3rd floor wrh owns 2 floors floor hotel absolutely luxury queen bed fresh linens marble flooring pretty drapes flatscreen tv breakfast laid bathroom equally nice updated shower instead usual spout circular faucet streams water shooting circle head weird ive typed outbut amazing beyond suite super cleanand im somewhat ocd cleanliness location hotel youre termini easily public transportation station little sketchy night

Reviews.Title: “Close to Termini Station, Helpful reception But poor condition of bathroom.”

Reviews.Content: stayed recently disappointed typical style rome lifts allows size adults limited luggage pictures shown website bit misleading definitely clean stains walls bad unbearable leaking sink mouldy shower poor ventilation bathroom poor ventilation causes unpleasant smell stayed 3 nights heater failed nights breakfast provided simple expect amount paying believe choices free wifi connection fast reception helpful recommended cheap family run restuarants helpful directions conclusion looking slightly shower sleep recommended

Reviews.Title: “Good location and great staff”
